t: The 4 Best Places for Custom Magic Playmats - Draftsim
s: October 16, 2024 - They offer plenty of customization ... a solid brand overall. I’ve had a few friends who bought playmats from Inked Gaming, wished they had a discount code, and noted they’re much better quality than Ultra PRO. Their products are unreal, and they fit nearly any budget. You still have options if you’re trying to ball on a budget. Etsy offers some custom playmats for a lower price, but the quality can be mediocre. You can also find playmats on Amazon if Etsy isn’t ...

t: Frequent Questions – Page PageDrop – Inked Gaming
s: How do playmats get shipped to me? They are rolled and shipped in a tube. We never fold our mats for shipment. Can you do more custom sized mats? Sorry! The sizes we have listed are the sizes we can make. If you have a middle-sized image you can have it printed onto a larger mat and then trim it down the mat once it arrives.
